amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to provides for an additional, independent safety review of an approved pipeline route or segment of route, should a state or tribal government deem it necessary.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to provides for an additional, independent safety review of an approved pipeline route or segment of route, should a state or tribal government deem it necessary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 263 (Roll no. 590).

action.text: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Lynch to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 263 (Roll no. 590).
